dcterms:description: A large-scale benchmark for video object detection, consisting of 3,862 training video snippets and 555 validation video snippets, with 30 object categories.
dcterms:title: ImageNet VID

dcterms:description: A dataset used for training optical flow estimation networks, consisting of synthetic image pairs with ground truth optical flow.
dcterms:title: Flying Chairs
